name: Gin Rummy Multiplayer
description:
Get ready for a card game that makes all other forms of entertainment look like deadwood: Gin Rummy Multiplayer!

Gin Rummy is a hugely popular card game, where the aim is to form sets and runs of cards before your opponent. It's simple and quick to play, and if you are new to the game then Gin Rummy Multiplayer provides everything you need to learn it!

Featuring:
1. Play with real players anywhere in the world
2. Auto sort cards
3. Add other players as friends
4. Chat with other players at the game tables
5. Join to your friends’ tables with one click and start to play with them
6. Join VIP Room and create your own game tables by deciding bet amounts and ending points
7. Gin Rummy Rules & Help
8. Designed for both Tablet and Phone
9. Hours of Entertainment!
10. Smooth gameplay.

Gin Rummy is a terrific game that you're sure to enjoy. Score Big with Gin Bonus, Big Gin and Undercut!

Do remember to rate “Gin Rummy Multiplayer”. It makes us happy to serve you even better.
